dcterms:description: The AVA-ActiveSpeaker dataset is the first large-scale test-bed for active speaker detection (ASD), containing 262 Hollywood movies with bounding boxes for a total of 5.3 million faces, manually linked to produce face tracks that contain a single identity.
dcterms:title: AVA-ActiveSpeaker

dcterms:creator: Juan Le´on-Alc´azar
Fabian Caba Heilbron
Ali Thabet
Bernard Ghanem
dcterms:description: Talkies is a manually labeled dataset for the active speaker detection task, collected from social media videos, containing 23,507 face tracks extracted from a total of 799,446 individual face detections.
dcterms:title: Talkies
